Use a saw to cut things: A saw is a great alternative to scissors and knives. It can be used to cut through various materials such as wood, metal, and plastic. It can be used to cut paper, fabric, and other soft materials as well.

Use a scissor alternative: There are many alternatives to scissors such as scissor-like tools like shears, nippers, and clippers. These tools can be used for cutting materials such as paper, fabric, and other soft materials.

Use a knife alternative: There are many alternatives to knives such as bread knives, butter knives, and steak knives. These knives can be used to cut various materials such as bread, cheese, and meat.

Use a laser cutter: A laser cutter is a machine that uses a laser beam to cut through materials. It can be used to cut paper, fabric, and other soft materials. It can also be used to cut wood, metal, and plastic.

Use a drill: A drill is a tool that is used to drill holes in materials. It can also be used to cut materials such as wood, metal, and plastic. It can be used to cut paper, fabric, and other soft materials as well.
